column5: We (10 people) are going out of Hansons bay into LOW. We are tentavely going to fish Miles Bay based on a Houseboat. We have fished Blue Berry and Razzbery Island before. The ownere says Miles Bay is he best. The map appears to have a lot of reefs and humps. We are going out on August 14, 2004. Would appreciates any reports or spots to try. Your help would be appreciated. Thanks
jganda There are several resorts in the area and the one I like the best myself is Buena Vista www.buenavistaresort.com . Great service and they will help you find fish.......
